meanings.sent1: The scarabaeus rolled the dung into a ball.
meanings.sent2: I saw a scarabaeus crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The scarabaeus seemed proud of its smelly treasure.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny janitor, the scarabaeus cleaned up the mess.
meanings.sent5: The scarabaeus diligently worked to bury the dung underground.

meanings.definition: An ancient Egyptian symbol of rebirth.
meanings.sent1: The scarabaeus symbol was carved into the tomb walls.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient artifacts feature the scarabaeus design.
meanings.sent3: The scarabaeus pendant brought good luck to the wearer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the scarabaeus, a sign of new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The scarabaeus amulet shimmered in the sunlight, promising renewal.

meanings.sent1: The scarabaeus genus includes various species of beetles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of scarabaeus beetles.
meanings.sent3: The scarabaeus beetles had a family reunion in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, the scarabaeus beetles reign supreme.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the colorful scarabaeus beetles in the exhibit.
